title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view is resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127, the tool items such as the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) move below the label. This behavior does not occur on build 20011116 on Nt2000. This movement of the icons may confuse users.
EB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) should remain aligned with the label. They should not move down below the label.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Linux, running build 20011127. 
2. Open the Navigator view. 
3. Resize the view to make it smaller. 
4. Observe the position of the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) in relation to the label.
